addShift: function(aShift,
options)
Adds a shift to the console.
allocateNewShift: function()
Used when it necessary to kick off shift allocation from with in a Space and not from the ShiftMenu.
function blurShift(shiftId)
Blurs a shift.
buildContents: function()
Builds the console area.
buildFrame: function()

Builds the plug-in menu for the console.

Deletes a shift from the server.

This returns a version of the pin reference object that is encodable.

getName : function()
Returns the name of the shift.
getPinElement: function()
Returns the current element that is pinned.
getPinRef : function()
Returns the set pinRef object if this shift has one.
getPinTarget: function()
Returns the current pin target if there is one.
getPinTargetStyles : function()
Returns the JSON object of the target nodes CSS dimension styles.

defaultValue)

defaultValue,
rawValue)

Hides a shift from the page.

function loadSpace(space,
pendingShift,
callback)

function loadStyle(url,
callback,
frame)
Loads a CSS file, processes it to make URLs absolute, then appends it as a STYLE element in the page HEAD.
function log(msg,
verbose)
Logs a message to the console, but only in debug mode or when reporting errors.

refresh: function()
Resize the content area.
refresh : function()
You should always provide some kind of refresh function so that your shift can correct itself for resize operations, window size changs, showing, hiding, etc.
regionIsObscured : function(region)
Checks to see if any of the visible shifts are obscuring the region.
